content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Both the Verizon MiFi 8800L and the AT&T Netgear Nighthawk M1 are excellent options for portable Wi-Fi hotspots. They're both well-regarded for their fast speeds, reliable coverage, and long battery life.

As a remote worker, having a reliable internet connection is crucial, and a portable Wi-Fi hotspot can provide you with the flexibility and freedom to work from anywhere. It's great that you're thinking ahead and planning for your connectivity needs.

Before you make a final decision, I recommend checking the coverage and speeds in the specific areas you'll be visiting in NYC. You can use the providers' websites or online tools to check the coverage in your desired locations.

Additionally, you may want to consider the following:

* Check the hotspot's compatibility with your devices and operating systems.
* Look into the hotspot's security features, such as encryption and password protection.
* Consider the cost of the hotspot and the data plans offered by the provider.
* Check if the hotspot has any additional features, such as a built-in VPN or support for multiple devices.

By doing your research and comparing the features and plans, you'll be able to find the perfect portable Wi-Fi hotspot for your needs.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Safe travels and happy remote working!
